1334610.name: Takelshin
1334610.description:
Takelshin is a 2D platformer in the style of old 8- and 16-bit classics.

You take the role of Takelshin - a little octopus girl on her way through many different stages such as deep waters or colorful autumn forests.

Takelshin's mission is to get on a flying pirate ship and free her younger baby siblings from the clutches of pirate lady Scallywag Sally.

NEW: Intakelactic Adventure! The current version includes an expansion pack that can be optionally activated in the main menu. This is another brand new adventure, in which Takelshin's "yummy donut" is stolen by small, cute alien creatures and our little heroine therefore has to go deep into space.



• FULL VERSION + Expansion Pack! No further, hidden costs.

• more than 30 stages including secret worlds and bonus games in total.

• catchy chiptune soundtrack.

• 3 difficulty levels - the hardest one hast to be unlocked.

• over 15 completely different, cute designed enemy types.

• 7 tricky bosses.

• combo system to break the high score.

• automatically saved score after each completed stage.

• easy to control via gamepad (dual stick or directional pad) or via keyboard.

• tutorial included.
